abstract.title: Abstract Writing Guide

structure.title: Basic Introduction
structure.description: 1-2 sentences providing a basic introduction to the field, comprehensible to scientists in any discipline.

structure.title: Detailed Background
structure.description: 2-3 sentences of more detailed background, comprehensible to scientists in related disciplines.

structure.title: General Problem
structure.description: 1 sentence clearly stating the general problem being addressed by this study.

structure.title: Main Result
structure.description: 1 sentence summarizing the main result using 'here we show' or equivalent.

structure.title: Results with Comparisons
structure.description: 2-3 sentences explaining what the main result reveals compared to previous knowledge. Include specific quantitative results.

structure.title: General Context
structure.description: 1-2 sentences placing your results in a broader context.

structure.title: Broader Perspective
structure.description: 2-3 sentences (optional) providing broader perspective on implications and future impact.

tips: Write as coherent, cohesive sentences without line breaks
Use present tense for general facts
Use past tense for specific prior research and your results
Explicitly indicate species with sample sizes

introduction.title: Introduction Writing Guide

structure.title: Problem Statement
structure.description: Introduce the broad research area, establish importance, provide context with statistics.

structure.title: Current Knowledge
structure.description: Summarize what is known, discuss existing approaches and achievements.

structure.title: Gaps and Limitations
structure.description: Identify specific limitations and explain why they matter.

structure.title: Your Approach
structure.description: Introduce your method and explain its unique advantages.

structure.title: Objectives and Hypotheses
structure.description: Clearly state research hypotheses and specific objectives.

structure.title: Preview of Findings
structure.description: Optional: Briefly preview main results and significance.

tips: Be specific about gaps in knowledge

methods.title: Methods Writing Guide

structure.title: Ethics/IRB Approval
structure.description: Describe ethical approval, informed consent, and compliance.

structure.title: Dataset and Study Design
structure.description: Describe dataset, participants, sample size, inclusion/exclusion criteria.

structure.title: Data Acquisition
structure.description: Detail how data were collected, instruments used, sampling rates.

structure.title: Data Processing
structure.description: Describe preprocessing, filtering, normalization steps.

structure.title: Feature Extraction
structure.description: If applicable, describe features and include mathematical formulations.

structure.title: Statistical Analysis
structure.description: Describe tests, significance thresholds, corrections for multiple comparisons.

structure.title: Software and Reproducibility
structure.description: List software, versions, and reproducibility measures.

tips: Be specific about parameters and settings

results.title: Results Writing Guide

structure.title: Overview
structure.description: Brief overview of main findings.

structure.title: Primary Results
structure.description: Present primary findings with statistical support.

structure.title: Secondary Results
structure.description: Present supporting or exploratory findings.

structure.title: Figures and Tables
structure.description: Reference and explain all figures and tables.

tips: Use figures and tables to support key results

structure.title: Summary of Findings
structure.description: Brief restatement of main results.

structure.title: Interpretation
structure.description: Explain what the results mean in context of your hypotheses.

structure.title: Comparison with Literature
structure.description: Compare findings with existing research.

structure.title: Mechanisms and Implications
structure.description: Discuss potential mechanisms and broader implications.

structure.title: Limitations
structure.description: Acknowledge study limitations honestly.

structure.title: Future Directions
structure.description: Suggest future research directions.

structure.title: Key Findings
structure.description: List 3-5 main contributions as concise bullet points.

keywords.title: Keywords Guide
tips: Choose terms not in the title
Use standard terminology from your field
Include both general and specific terms
